baseline_groups.claim_summary: Belief elicitation does not affect cooperation in finite PD games (null result).
baseline_groups.notes: Coef = -0.005 (p = 0.97). Probit with correlated RE. The null is the finding.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: Belief elicitation does not affect cooperation in indefinite PD games.

global_notes: Lab experiment at UCSB. Main finding is a null result. Custom specs test different questions (treatment effects of finite horizon, belief-cooperation relationship).
